titleStmt.title: A motive to peace and love. Delivered in a sermon at Pauls the first Lords Day in June, anno Dom. 1648. By Humfry Chambers, D.D. and pastor of Pewsy in the county of Wilts.
titleStmt.author: Chambers, Humphrey, 1598 or 9-1662.
City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: The last leaf bears an order to print fromn the Lord Mayor.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 11th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley
